segment.source: How to Transfer Access and Configurations to Another Version of a Package by Using the Management Console
segment.target: How to Transfer Access and Configurations to Another Version of a Package by Using the Management Console

segment.source: How to Transfer Access and Configurations to Another Version of a Package by Using the Management Console
segment.target: How to Transfer Access and Configurations to Another Version of a Package by Using the Management Console

segment.source: How to Transfer Access and Configurations to Another Version of a Package by Using the Management Console
segment.target: How to Transfer Access and Configurations to Another Version of a Package by Using the Management Console

segment.source: Use the following procedure to transfer the access and default package configurations to another version of a package by using the management console.
segment.target: Use the following procedure to transfer the access and default package configurations to another version of a package by using the management console.

segment.source: To transfer access and configurations to another version of a package
segment.target: To transfer access and configurations to another version of a package

segment.source: To view the package that you want to configure, open the App-V 5.1 Management Console.
segment.target: To view the package that you want to configure, open the App-V 5.1 Management Console.

segment.source: Select the package to which you will transfer the new configuration, right-click the package and select transfer default configuration from or transfer access and configurations from, depending on the configuration that you want to transfer.
segment.target: Select the package to which you will transfer the new configuration, right-click the package and select transfer default configuration from or transfer access and configurations from, depending on the configuration that you want to transfer.

segment.source: To transfer the configuration, in the Select Previous Version dialog box, select the package that contains the settings that you want to transfer, and then click OK.
segment.target: To transfer the configuration, in the Select Previous Version dialog box, select the package that contains the settings that you want to transfer, and then click OK.

segment.source: If you select transfer default configuration from, then only the underlying dynamic deployment configuration will be transferred.
segment.target: If you select transfer default configuration from, then only the underlying dynamic deployment configuration will be transferred.

segment.source: If you select transfer access and configurations from, then all access permissions, as well as the configuration settings, will be copied.
segment.target: If you select transfer access and configurations from, then all access permissions, as well as the configuration settings, will be copied.
